extracted_playbook.title: Confirm No Malicious Binary Presence
extracted_playbook.description: Forensically confirm that the malicious binary was never present on the systems. Ensure that the network does not utilize affected versions of SolarWinds Orion products.

extracted_playbook.title: Initiate Incident Response Procedures
extracted_playbook.description: Assume the environment has been compromised and initiate incident response procedures immediately. Coordinate with leadership and incident response team for recovery and remediation.

extracted_playbook.title: Rebuild Platform and Harden Configuration
extracted_playbook.description: Rebuild the platform and harden the configuration based on SolarWinds secure configuration guidelines. Resume use after thorough risk evaluation.

extracted_playbook.title: Deny All Communications Outside Network Management Enclave

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Cloud and On-Premises Instances
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure cloud instances of Orion only monitor cloud resources in that cloud infrastructure. On-premises instances should not be permissioned with any cloud/hosted identity accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Change Account Credentials and Enable MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Change all account credentials or shared secrets used by the affected SolarWinds Orion device. Enable MFA for these credentials whenever possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Inbound Trust Relationships
extracted_playbook.description: Remove all inbound trust relationships to the SolarWinds Orion device being rebuilt.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Logging and Update Platform
extracted_playbook.description: Configure logging to ensure all logs are captured and stored for at least 180 days. Implement subsequent SolarWinds Orion Platform updates within 48 hours of release.
